summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of 35th Avenue Southwest from West Kenyon Street to West Barton Street, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8199 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
